TopicTitle: Breaking ground surface features disappeared after updating a 1.7.3 modded game to 1.10.1

Articles.Content: As the title says my modded game had surface features previously when I was playing on 1.7.3 I then updated the game and mods to 1.10.1 and the features seem to have vanished. I have tried using the in game alt f12 menu to help but I'm not seeing anything to indicate that they exist. I have tried to google the problem to no avail. If anyone knows of a mod that might be causing this or a fix to get them back that would be awesome.

Sounds like your save game hasn’t quite made the transition to 1.10.1. Fortunately there’s an easy way to fix it:

  1. Start a new game in 1.10.1, it doesn’t matter what type. Save the game.
  2. Open the KSP directory then open saves/(new save name) and open persistent.sfs in a text editor of your choice (notepad etc.)
  3. Near the top of the save file you’ll find ROCSeed = (bunch of numbers), copy this line.
  4. Open your existing game’s persistent.sfs file and paste the copied ROCSeed into it, overwrite the existing one if there’s one already there.

That should hopefully make the Breaking Ground surface features reappear.
I did try a new save to see it it was just the one I was on and they still did not show up even on the new save
